channel.title: Need some basic help? Look here!
channel.description:
I am offering my services in troubleshooting and problem solving, I feel that people on here could use some help without the sarcasm and useless comments, so here I am.
Here is what I can help with: [ul][li]Compiling Errors/Issues[/li] [li]Questions relating to code[/li] [li]Fixing up code/syntax[/li] [li]Cleaning of code[/li][/ul]
If you want my help you MUST provide the file(s) on pastebin and post the link so I can actually help you. My skype is projectcxr if you want to request the help on skype. If you're having a compiler issue, post a screenshot of the compiler window, not just copy and paste one or two lines out of it...

item.title: Need some basic help? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @111165 ຜູ້ຊ່ວຍ
item.description:
@111165 wrote:

Your help to the community is probably greatly appreciated, but this is not the correct section to post your services. This section is specifically for retrieving help from a problem that people are encountering with their servers. This post would be more fit in this section:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,230.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Need some basic help? Look here!
